Tridi — About

Tridi is a JavaScript library which creates interactive 360 3D product views based on series of images used as frames.

It supports all desktop browsers (including IE 10 and IE 11) as well as mobile browsers. It is originally written in TypeScript.

Why another product viewer?

The idea of creating product presentations based on sets of rotating images is neither new nor innovative. There are dozens of companies which specialize in creating product presentations from scratch. A few similar open source projects are also available. That kind of product presentation is used on majority of car manufacturers' websites.

Tridi originated as a quick and dirty replacement for a legacy product viewer on a website I maintained at work. I decided to spend some of my free time after work and build it the way I wanted a library like that to look like: well-documented, thoroughly tested and easy to maintain and integrate into any project.
